name: Clockmaker
ability: You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
howToRun: During the first night, count the number of steps (clockwise) from the Demon to their nearest Minion. Show this number to the Clockmaker. Place the Clockmaker's Number reminder token.
firstNightDescription: During the first night, count the number of steps (clockwise) from the Demon to their nearest Minion. Show this number to the Clockmaker. Place the Clockmaker's Number reminder token.

legacy.firstNightReminder: Show the number of steps between the Demon and their closest Minion.

firstNight.description: On first night, learn the number of steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion (clockwise).

information.customMessage: You learn the number of steps to the nearest Minion: [NUMBER]
